p: In addition, the Regulation (EU) 1394/2007 left open the possibility of exceptions. In particular, the “hospital exemption” [ 10] allows for the administration of an ATMP without a license, provided that all the following conditions are met: 1) Their production is not systematic; 2) High quality standards are followed; 3) Prepared and used within the same member state; 4) They are administered in a hospital; 5) It is administered under the responsibility of the attending physician; 6) They are manufactured after a medical order and for a particular patient.
